card.name: Ultra Miracluppi
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, play Rock-Paper-Scissors with your opponent. If you win, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down, draw a card, destroy one of your opponent's creatures, choose a card in your opponent's mana zone and put it into its owner's graveyard, and put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Triple Breaker
